title: Drawing, "Drawer Pull: Black Lacquer, Polished Chrome", ca. 1925–35
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Small stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY Small stamp in red ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in red color pencil at upper margin, right: V. & S.- D - 2 Inscribed in graphite at lower right: "A" + "B" Inscribed dimensions, materials

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawer Pull: Black Lacquer, Polished Chrome", ca. 1925–35.
ca. 1925–35. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-131.
